title: KB Kachru elected as Hotel Association of India President for 2-year term
description: KB Kachru elected president of HAI, succeeding Puneet Chhatwal. Rohit Khosla as VP. New management team elected for a two-year term. Dr JK Mohanty, Sanjay Sethi, MP Bezbaruah, IHCL Seleqtions, Shashank Bhagat, Sonali Chauhan also elected.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
